The vast majority of Petare

By night, the district of

for crime, aggression
and gang activity.

Nightly police squads can be

to fight against drug trafficking
and the growing black market

which has been getting out
of hand, during this crisis.

For the past 20 years,
Petare has been notorious

for having the highest murder
rate per capita in the world.

And it is not recommended

especially if you're alone
or without a local friend.
